# Quick Facts

[Quick Fact Data](https://www.grandview.wa.us/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/City-of-Grandview-Quick-Facts.pdf)

Incorporated: September 22, 1909  
Non-Charter Code City, Mayor-Council Form of Government

Population: 11,043 Precipitation: 10 inches per year Elevation: 834 feet Annual Average Temperature: 67º F Churches: 19 Average sunshine days per year: 300 Newspapers: 1 Public Schools: 5 Libraries: 1 Parochial Schools: 1

5 city parks, 1 seasonal swimming pool, 18 hole golf course – [Black Rock Creek Golf Course](https://www.blackrockcreekgc.com/index.html), a 10,000 square foot community center, an 18-hole regulation disc golf course, and public library.  Our Country Park Events Center includes an amphitheater, covered picnic area, the Ralph Scott Memorial Ball Fields, the Seahawk Play 60 Playground and is the home of the annual Yakima Valley Fair &amp; Rodeo.

Grandview is the 3rd largest city in Yakima County.

- [Grandview Medical Center](https://www.sunnysidehospital.com/clinics/grandviewmed.html "Link to Grandview Medical Center")
- [Irrigation Specialists, Inc](https://www.irrspec.com).
- [JM Smucker Company](https://www.smuckers.com)
- [Kenyon Zero Storage, Inc.](https://www.kenyonzero.com "Link to Kenyon Zero Storage, Inc.")
- [Powell-Christensen, Inc.](https://www.repowell.net "Link to Powell-Christensen, Inc.")
- [RH Smith Distributing Co., Inc.](https://www.rhsmith.com "Link to RH Smith Dist. Co., Inc.")
- [Wal-Mart DC # 7021](https://foundation.walmart.com "Link to Walmart Foundation")
- [Welch’s, Inc.](https://www.welchs.com)
- [Yakima Valley College](https://www.yvcc.edu/grandview/Pages/default.aspx "Link to YVCC-Grandview Campus")
- [Yakima Valley Farm Workers Clinic](https://www.yvfwc.com/grandview-medical-dental-clinic "Link to Yakima Valley Farm Workers Clinic")
- [Safeway Store # 1593](https://local.safeway.com/wa/grandview-1593.html "Link to Safeway Store #1593")
